really good spot for a date night movie. The chairs are super comfortable and they can even charge your phone.

I paid 39 dollars worth of food and it was cold! I called the staff for help and asked them to warm it up. It took them over 20 minutes, I called them again and they brought me my food 10 minutes later IN THE SAME CONDITION! Then the staff snickered afterwards. First and LAST time coming to this place.
Such a great atmosphere at the bar and super comfortable seats in the theaters. Great service and great food!
Love this place and they keep the place clean and the servers are nice and friendly.

The best movie place
I always come here with my kids. The staff is always friendly and polite. The food here is good.

This is the movie theater to visit in Glendale go on Tuesdays for the best movie ticket deals! The wings are great and they don't skimp on the booze when it comes to mix drinks. If you are looking for great popcorn you won't find it hear. Instead you get excellent desserts  and meals.
After Studio Movie Grill I feel like I can never go to a reg theater again
Great food!

Great customer service, food (mac & cheese)
New way of watching movies 🎥 🍿 nice, clean movie. They serve food and alcohol 🍷. Seats  💺 are very comfortable automatically recline , heated and cooled.
Great experience.
Love love this palce we went for my Bday the staff is friendly and they love what they do . Food is soooo good will be coming back 😊
Love this place.... Get the chicken wings!! Sooooo good!! 😁
Great theater and very good food and service.
Our favorite place for movie where you can lay down, drink some wine or eat something and enjoy you movie

The service was great and the servers were very nice. The tickets are veeery cheap on Tuesdays.

Beautiful place!! Excellent service,very clean theater,good prices and they have  good specials every day. I highly recommend this movie theater.

First theater experience as a Californian and I loved it. The seats and overall experience were awesome. You have access to nonstop service throughout but it doesn’t deter from the movie. Comfortable seats and really affordable prices. The …
This place has great customer service! The lobby smells good! The theater is big, and the chairs are very comfortable with a butt-warmer! Be ready to pay huge for cocktails and food though!

Went to 2 showings in1 day. The first time was very nice! But the 2nd showing was absolutely horrible.!!!  I ordered the same cocktail never received it charge for too little candies the bill came to $28 or $29.78 had to leave the movie to …

Oh man I've missed these full service theatres! This one is particularly nice with reserved seating in oversized recliners. Table service includes a full bar, snacks, pizzas, burgers and more. The chips with queso is a comfort food I'd been missing from Texas, that's right honest to god chile con queso mmmmmmm!
Amazing place
Love this place

Excellent service and accomodations!
Sooo nice I love this place never going anywhere else

Had a really good experience recently, staff was SUPER nice, attentive, courteous, pro.  Food was a big surprise, didn't expect much and was really quite good! Veggie wrap and BBQ flat bread pretty delicious.  Nice job crew!  And yes, seats are incredible. Heated, comfy, deluxe.

A movie going experience fit for a king! This will certainly become my movie theater of choice in the Glendale area.  5 star service: order your food and drink from your seat mid movie with minimal distraction and quality attentiveness  5 …

Disappointing experience overall. Took my kids to see Frozen II Saturday night and though the theater and the reclining seats are really nice the food and service left a lot to be desired.  Ordered the brisket sliders with fries and though …

Tickets are cheap and they actually offer student discounts! The staff is super friendly and the seats are very comfortable. I just think that for the price of the food, they don’t really give you enough as compared to other restaurants in the area.

The people who work here are super friendly! Everyone greets you. I’ve visited three times and I’m impressed with how cheap ticket prices are compared to Pacific Theaters. Unlike them, SMG actually offers student discounts & $5 Tuesdays. …
So Comfortable. Good food too!
Cool place. There should be on e in van nuys some where...the drinks are a little pricy...and it smell wonderful inside
Dinner and a show! I had the brisket sliders and they were delicious. I'm recommending this to all my friends!
Really nice place

Fancy theater with reasonable priced tickets. Only downside I see is that food is on the pricey side and  bathrooms at the adjacent building for theaters 3 and up are non functional as of this writing. Theater was huuuuuuge.  Customer …

Great theater experience. The recliner chair has heating function. It’s quite comfortable. The service was wonderful. Our service guy Ben was extremely polite. We did not order food as we came here after dinner. They also serve wine and …

5 rows of lux recliners with heated seats, cooled cup holders and a full menu of comfort food, liquor and wine delivered straight to your seat.  Is it enough to give movie theaters a fighting chance against Netflix & the couchsurfing generation?
The seats were awesome and so was the service
Bar + food + movie + best seats =Studio Movie Grill .... thank you guys see you soon
We had a great experience. The service is first class. It reminds me of In N Out Burger or Chick Filla. This will be our go to movie theater.
Went to see a 215p movie, arrived before 215. Nothing is playing on the screen, 15 minutes later still nothing playing. Manny the manager on site couldn’t care less 🤷🏽‍♀️

I totally enjoyed the experience. It is very comfortable, food was great and service was excellent. Would definitely go again.
Amazing!!! Great food, movie, drinks, service, and they have reclining seats!! Would recommend for everyone!!!
Awesome place.. Enjoyed every moment with my family...
Very nice place

Great Service 👍🙏😊
A nice place with comfortable seats. Wait staff will take your order and bring food to you. Ask about discount movies.
Absolutely fabulous!

I have to say the service is top notch! Nearly every employee greeted our group and made us feel very welcomed. Ticket prices were great and menu options were plentiful.  However, there are a few things for management to work on.  The …
Favorite new theater

This is the second time I've been here and what I can tell you right off is the hospitality and service is amazing. I brought my mother the second time and she got a little teary eyed at how nice everyone was. One of the members there even …

State of the art movie theater with gourmet food!  Went to SMG’s newest location last night. Sparkling interior design, inviting bar and entrance.  I went to theater #4. Comfortable and adjustable recliner seats combined with a solid sound and picture.  SMG “Impossible” burger recommended!

Thank you so much for the great experience can’t wait to be back . They have great comfortable seating , great drinks and dishes at affordable prices . The staff was polite and professional. There is free public parking at front for the first 90 mins then 1 dollar every 30 mins . Can’t wait to come back :D
Food was fantastic. Service was incredible. Facilities are out of this world! Top notch experience!
Amazing recliners, sound, picture and food with the fine dining hospitality.  Glad to have this location in Glendale.  Loved the Kabobs and BSB Bourbon!
The food was delicious and our server was very nice
Hands down, the best service I have ever experienced! The food and drinks were amazing as well.
We were the first guests and right away we got the best service. Not your typical movie theater ! Managers make sure your experiences was perfect ! 10/10
Studio Movie Grill is a stain on the movie going experience and I am legitimately angry they opened in my neighborhood.
The chairs look next level! Can't wait to visit!
OMG - I cannot wait for this to open!  I absolutely love Studio Movie Grill.
